SortReplicas.title: Sorting
SortReplicas.description: Specify sorting for each document type indexed. Example: product:name-asc, will allow sorting by name in ascending order. More info here: https://www.algolia.com/doc/guides/managing-results/refine-results/sorting/how-to/sort-by-attribute

Version.title: Algolia Search Edition
Version.description: Version will determine features that are available to the provider. For example virtual replicas for sorting only available in Premium edition.
